title: England v Canada: Women’s Rugby World Cup final – live
summary: The Red Roses face Canada in a highly anticipated match for the championship title at Twickenham, drawing a sold-out crowd. The event promises an exciting atmosphere as both teams compete for the ultimate prize. Follow along with live updates from Luke McLaughlin.

title: Crystal Palace v Liverpool, Atlético v Real Madrid and more: clockwatch – live
summary: Stay updated with live coverage as our writers provide real-time updates from the afternoon Premier League matches and other games. Don't miss the latest scores and highlights. Join us for an engaging sports experience!

title: Ryder Cup 2025: day two – live
summary: European teams are looking to extend their lead on day two at Bethpage Black. Live updates provide hole-by-hole coverage of the ongoing golf event. Stay tuned for the latest developments from the tournament.

title: US military brass brace for firings as Pentagon chief orders top-level meeting
summary: Pete Hegseth organized a gathering for hundreds of military generals and admirals in Virginia. The event focused on receiving a motivational address centered on the concept of 'warrior ethos.' This initiative aimed to reinforce military values and leadership principles among senior officers.

title: Labour conference chance to show alternative to ‘toxic divide and decline’ offered by Reform, says Starmer – as it happened
summary: At the Labour Party conference, the Prime Minister emphasized it as a significant opportunity to present their case to the nation. He highlighted the importance of the event in shaping public perception. The conference serves as a platform for the party to outline its policies and connect with constituents.
